name: Popcorn Producer | V1.1.0
description:
Welcome to Popcorn Producer!

THIS GAME WILL STILL GET UPDATED!!

Version: 1.1.1
POSSIBLE FUTURE FEATURES:
- Enchantments
- More Upgrades

INSTRUCTIONS:
Run a popcorn stand during the day, and get upgrade points after each day.
Use upgrade points to, well, get upgrades! (EX: Increase Popcorn Produced per Cycle, Costumer Patience.)
Make sure NO costumer storms off unhappy, or they'll report you to the theater, and you'll be banned from the property.
After each day, costumers become less patient and they'll come faster. Make sure to spend some points to increase these numbers!
Want more of a challenge? Try Hardcore Mode!
- Increases Costumer Speed

CONTROLS:
Space: Deliver Popcorn

PLOT LINE:
In your town, there's a popular theater that many people go to.
Unfortunately, the popcorn there's quite expensive, and many people are unhappy about these prices.
That's when you get an idea!
You decide to spend your extra cash on a popcorn machine, and set the stand up outside the theater.
News starts to spread about your popcorn stand, and costumers start coming more often.
That's about it for the plot line!
